summary: This document is an email chain from August 2022, forwarding a victim's report to the FBI. The victim, an Australian woman, alleges she was targeted for over 30 years by a sexual abuse ring connected to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, involving Australian government and police sources, with specific targeting via email from 2006-2013.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator connected to a sexual abuse ring; the victim alleges direct online targeting by him from 2006-2013.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator connected to a sexual abuse ring; the victim alleges direct online targeting by her from 2006-2013.

connections.description: Both are named together by the victim as connected to the same sexual abuse ring and as having directly targeted her online.

events.title: Online Targeting by Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: The victim alleges she was directly targeted online via email by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell during these years.

events.title: Victim's Report Submission
events.description: The victim sends an email detailing her allegations of long-term targeting and abuse connected to Epstein and Maxwell, requesting urgent FBI attention.

events.title: Email Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An internal email forwards the victim's report to the FBI for attention.

keyFacts: An Australian woman alleges she is a victim of a sexual abuse ring connected to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, involving prominent people, government, and police sources in Australia.

The victim claims to have been targeted for over 30 years, starting from age 14, with the targeting including intellectual property theft, career destruction for sex demands, money laundering, police targeting, grooming, and falsified charges.
She alleges direct online targeting via email by Epstein and Maxwell specifically between 2006 and 2013.
The victim states that higher power government sources have covered up her reports for over 10 years, leaving her entrapped and in fear for her life, currently self-isolating for protection.
The email chain shows the report was forwarded internally for submission to the FBI in August 2022.
